Sentence.sentence: Clearly, richer societies are able to provide environmental improvements which lie well beyond the reach of poorer communities.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The problem with lighting, if it arises, often doesn't lie in light sources but in their applications.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Part of the fault lies with our inner caveman.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Nick Perks, project director for Climate Solidarity, believes this sort of activity is where the future of environmental action lies.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But in practice, our brain discounts the risks — and benefits — associated with issues that lie some way ahead.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Private spaceflight could lie within reach of rich civilians in a few years.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Down that path lies economic decline.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: When asked straightforwardly, people tend to lie or shade the truth when the subject is sex, money or employment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: people tend to lie when talking on the phone
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Around the same time, I noticed that those who part with $2285 a night to stay in a cliff-top room at the Post Ranch Inn in Big Sur, California, pay partly for the privilege of not having a TV in their rooms; the future of travel, I'm reliably told, lies in "black-hole resorts," which charge high prices precisely because you can't get online in their rooms
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: At the heart of the debate over illegal immigration lies one key question: are immigrants good or bad for the economy?
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: According to Valerie Gauthier, associate dean at HEC Paris, the key lies in the process by which MBA programmes recruit their students
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: So when fly the north, they might lay eggs in Louisiana and die.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They start to lay eggs when they are nine months old
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Only the strongest can reach their destination to lay eggs.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Later working together in London, they laid the foundations of modern physics by showing that normal laws of cause and effect do not apply at the level of subatomic particles.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They lay great emphasis on hard work.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Last year, Andrea's husband, Rick, a miner in Nevada was laid off.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: She injured her spine in a fall and a doctor told her to lie flat on her back for a month so it can mend.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Make your own way"," Stand on your own two feet" or my mother's favorite remark when I was face-to-face with consequences of some action: Now that you've made your bed, lie on it.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Within samples collected from the solid substances lying beneath the ice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And we are less likely to lie when we have moral reminders or when we think others are watching.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: But in practice, our brain discounts the risks —and benefits — associated with issues that lie some way ahead.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: But others opted to lie, and they showed increased activity in their frontal parietal (颅腔壁的) control network, which is involved in difficult or complex thinking.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: But surely everyone reading this has had times when you lie in bed for hours, unable to fall asleep because your brain is thinking about work.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Enormous opportunities also lie with e-waste.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: External conditions also matter in terms of when and how often we lie.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: If after work you lie around on your bed and get irritated by political commentary on your phone or get stressed thinking about decisions about how to renovate your home, your brain has not received a break from high mental arousal states.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: If you lie in bed for eight hours, you may have rested, but you can still feel exhausted the next day.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Psychologists call them "masters of deception", those rare individuals with a natural ability to tell, with complete confidence, when someone is telling a lie.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The amygdala is a crucial part of the brain that produces fear, anxiety and emotional responses including that sinking, guilty feeling you get when you lie.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: This means that if you give people multiple opportunities to lie for their own benefit, they start with little lies which get bigger over time.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: We are more likely to lie, research shows, when we are able to rationalise it, when we are stressed and fatigued or sec others being dishonest.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"位于"之意。
means: situate ： 通常用过去分词作表语，指某城镇、乡村或某物等的地理位置与环境的关系，即在何处。
lie ： 最常用词，不及物，指国家、城镇、道路、湖海等所处的位置。
stand ： 多指建筑物等被想象为主体的物体立于某处。

word_mean: 胎儿位置，胎儿姿势：胎儿纵轴与母体纵轴的关系，见presentation项下

means.word_mean: 躺；卧；平躺；平卧；横卧(常与 down 连用)

sentences.cn: 他折断了腿, 不得不总是躺着。

sentences.en: The national hero lies buried here.
sentences.cn: 那位民族英雄就安葬在这里。

means.word_mean: 位于, 坐落在

sentences.en: There lies a small town at the foot of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 山脚下有一个小镇。

means.word_mean: 展现, 伸展, , 铺展, 展开

sentences.en: Ahead lay a vast expanse of wheat.
sentences.cn: 前面是一大片小麦。

means.word_mean: 说谎; 撒谎; 编造谎言

sentences.en: Obviously he was lying.
sentences.cn: 显然他是在撒谎。

sentences.en: The town lay in ruins after a heavy bombardment.
sentences.cn: 在猛烈轰炸以后城镇成了一片废墟。

means.word_mean: 思想、特征、问题等存在；在于(常与 in 连用)

sentences.en: The fundamental way out lies in reform and openness.
sentences.cn: 根本出路在于改革开放。

sentences.cn: 我们应该首先看看风向如何。

sentences.en: The books have been lying here ever since they were laid here.
sentences.cn: 这些书自从放在这里就一直未动过。

sentences.en: He tried to tell me a lie about losing his wallet.
sentences.cn: 他试图使我相信他丢失了钱夹的谎言。

假象，造成错觉的事物；欺诈，欺骗行为
说谎，撒谎，讲假话

sentences.en: The child lied to the teacher about his reasons for being late.

means.word_mean: (事物)给以错觉；造成假象；不可靠；欺骗

sentences.en: The statistics must be lying.
sentences.cn: 统计数字一定有假。</seg>

take no action regarding a controversial or problematic matter

jx.jx_en_mean: (of the corpse of a person of national importance) be laid in a public place of honour before burial
jx.jx_cn_mean: （伟人遗体安葬前）受公众吊唁

jx.jx_en_mean: conceal oneself, waiting to surprise, attack, or catch someone
jx.jx_cn_mean: 埋伏准备惊吓（或袭击、抓住）某人

lj.lj_ly: at the time of the murder he appears to have been lying low in a barn.

jx.jx_cn_mean: ［多用于否定］默默承受侮辱（或挫折、指责等）

lj.lj_ly: I'm excited by what lies ahead.

jx.jx_en_mean: (of an object) be left carelessly out of place

lj.lj_ly: I became irritated at the pills and potions lying around in every corner of the house.
lj.lj_ls: 房子里到处都是药片和药剂，使我十分恼火。

jx.jx_en_mean: be the real, often hidden, reason for (something)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 是（事件）背后真正的原因

lj.lj_ly: a subtle strategy lies behind such silly claims.
lj.lj_ls: 如此愚蠢的要求背后隐藏着诡秘的计谋。

entry.def: If you are lying somewhere, you are in a horizontal position and are not standing or sitting.

example.ex: There was a child lying on the ground...
example.tran: 地上躺着一个小孩。

example.ex: The injured man was lying motionless on his back...
example.tran: 那名受伤的男子一动不动地仰面躺在那里。

entry.def: If an object lies in a particular place, it is in a flat position in that place.

example.ex: ...a newspaper lying on a nearby couch...
example.tran: 放在旁边沙发上的一张报纸

example.ex: Broken glass lay scattered on the carpet.
example.tran: 碎玻璃散落在地毯上。

entry.def: If you say that a place lies in a particular position or direction, you mean that it is situated there.

example.ex: The islands lie at the southern end of the Kurile chain.
example.tran: 这些岛屿位于千岛群岛的南端。

entry.def: You can use lie to say that something is or remains in a particular state or condition. For example, if something lies forgotten, it has been and remains forgotten.

example.ex: She turned back to the Bible lying open in her lap...
example.tran: 她将注意力又转回到摊放在腿上的《圣经》。

example.ex: The picture lay hidden in the archives for over 40 years...
example.tran: 这张照片在档案室中藏了40多年。

entry.def: You can use lie to say what position a competitor or team is in during a competition.

example.ex: I was going well and was lying fourth...
example.tran: 我当时发挥不错，排在第四。

example.ex: Blyth Tait is lying in second place.
example.tran: 布莱思·泰特目前名列第二。

entry.def: You can talk about where something such as a problem, solution, or fault lies to say what you think it consists of, involves, or is caused by.
entry.tran: （问题、解决方法、过错等）存在，在于

example.ex: The problem lay in the large amounts spent on defence...
example.tran: 问题在于防务方面耗资巨大。

example.ex: They will only assume that, as a woman, the fault lies with me...
example.tran: 他们只会假定是我出了错，因为我是女人。

entry.def: You use lie in expressions such as lie ahead ,lie in store, and lie in wait when you are talking about what someone is going to experience in the future, especially when it is something unpleasant or difficult.
entry.tran: （尤指不快或困难之事）将发生，在等待

example.ex: She'd  need all her strength and bravery to cope with what lay in store...
example.tran: 她需要所有的力量与勇气去应付将会出现的问题。

example.ex: The President's  most serious challenges lie ahead.
example.tran: 对总统来说最为严重的挑战还在后面。

entry.def: Lie is used in formal English, especially on gravestones, to say that a dead person is buried in a particular place.
entry.tran: （尤用于墓碑上的文字中）长眠

example.ex: The inscription reads: Here lies Catin, the son of Magarus...
example.tran: 碑文写着：马格勒斯之子卡廷长眠于此。

example.ex: My father lies in the small cemetery a few miles up this road.
example.tran: 我父亲葬在沿这条路往北几英里处的一个小公墓里。

entry.def: If you say that light, clouds, or fog lie somewhere, you mean that they exist there or are spread over the area mentioned.

example.ex: It had been wet overnight, and a morning mist lay on the field.
example.tran: 前一天晚上下了雨，田野上笼着一层晨雾。

entry.def: The lie of an object or area is its position or the way that it is arranged.

example.ex: The actual site of a city is determined by the natural lie of the land.
example.tran: 城市的实际选址取决于这片土地的自然状况。

entry.def: A lie is something that someone says or writes which they know is untrue.

example.ex: 'Who else do you work for?' — 'No one.' — 'That's a lie.'...
example.tran: “你还为谁卖命？”——“没有谁。”——“你撒谎。”

example.ex: I've  had enough of your lies...
example.tran: 我已经听够了你的谎言。

entry.def: If someone is lying, they are saying something which they know is not true.

example.ex: I know he's lying...
example.tran: 我知道他在说谎。

example.ex: If asked, he lies about his age...
example.tran: 有人问起时，他就会谎报年龄。

entry.def: If you say that something lies, you mean that it does not express or represent something accurately.

example.ex: The camera can sometimes lie.
example.tran: 照相机拍出的照片有时也未必可靠。

entry.def: If something gives the lie to a statement, claim, or theory, it suggests or proves that it is not true.

example.ex: This survey gives the lie to the idea that Britain is moving towards economic recovery.
example.tran: 这项调查显示英国经济正在复苏的想法是失实的。

entry.def: If you say that someone is living a lie, you mean that in every part of their life they are hiding the truth about themselves from other people.
entry.tran: 虚伪地生活；活在谎言之中

example.ex: My mother never told my father the truth about me. We've been living a lie all this time.
example.tran: 母亲从来没告诉父亲我的真实身世。一直以来我们都活在谎言之中。

entry.def: People sometimes say 'I tell a lie' when they have just made a mistake in something that they are saying and immediately correct it.
entry.tran: （用于纠正口误）不对，我说错了

example.ex: It is the first scene of the play chronologically. I tell a lie, it's  actually strictly speaking the second scene.
example.tran: 从时间顺序上来看这是整个剧的第一场。不对，严格说来实际上是第二场。

means.word_mean: 1. a statement that deviates from or perverts the truth
2. position or manner in which something is situated
1. be located or situated somewhere; occupy a certain position
2. be lying, be prostrate; be in a horizontal position;

sentences.sentence: "The sick man lay in bed all day"
"the books are lying on the shelf"

means.word_mean: 3. originate (in);

sentences.sentence: "The problems dwell in the social injustices in this country"

means.word_mean: 4. be and remain in a particular state or condition;
5. tell an untruth; pretend with intent to deceive;

sentences.sentence: "She lied when she told me she was only 29"

means.word_mean: 6. have a place in relation to something else;

sentences.sentence: "The fate of Bosnia lies in the hands of the West"

means.word_mean: 7. assume a reclining position;

sentences.sentence: "lie down on the bed until you feel better"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English licgan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch liggen and German liegen, from an Indo-European root shared by Greek lekhos and Latin lectus 'bed'
Old English lyge (noun), lēogan (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch liegen and German lügen

means: Liechtenstein (whose capital is Vaduz) 列支敦士登（首都是瓦杜兹）

sentences.en: He scorns telling lies.

sentences.cn: 他不是一个肯说谎的人.

sentences.en: The boy is suspected of telling lies.

sentences.en: As children, we can't tell a lie.

sentences.cn: 母亲从来没告诉父亲我的真实身世。一直以来我们都活在谎言之中。

sentences.cn: “这个准则是我们长期编造的一个谎言，它造就了平庸。
sentences.en: “That's a lie that we have perpetuated, and it fosters commonness.

sentences.cn: 空闲时你喜欢干什么?
sentences.en: What do you like to do in your spare time?

sentences.cn: 真假参半的谎言最险恶.
sentences.en: A lie which is half a truth is ever the blackest of lies.

sentences.cn: 虽然谎言遮天蔽日,无处不在, 但是休想从我这里得到支持.
sentences.en: Though lies conceal everything , though lies embrace everything , but not with any help from me.

sentences.cn: 成功的婚姻都是谎言的根蒂根基上建立起来的,你已开了个好头.
sentences.en: Dr. House : The most successful marriages are based on lies . Youre off to a great start.

sentences.cn: 他试图使我相信他丢失了钱夹的谎言.
sentences.en: He tried to tell me a lie about losing his wallet.

sentences.cn: 白色的(善意的)谎言总比黑色的(恶意的)谎言要好.
sentences.en: A white lie is better than a black lie.

sentences.cn: 被戳穿谎言之后, 他的脸部表情异常地不自然.
sentences.en: When his lies were exposed, his expression was very unnatural.

sentences.cn: 他对她说的是一派谎言,可她却全部接受.
sentences.en: He tells her all those lies and she just laps them up.

sentences.cn: 箴14:25作真见证的、救人性命.吐出谎言的、施行诡诈.
sentences.en: A truthful witness saves lives, But he who utters lies is treacherous.

sentences.cn: 不管是小声低语还是在市场门口大声叫喊,谎言终归是谎言.
sentences.en: A lie is as much a lie , when it is whispered or when it is proclaimed at the market cross.

sentences.cn: 这一类的流言蜚语比具体的谎言更难对付.
sentences.en: Nonsense of this type is more difficult to combat than a solid lie.

sentences.cn: 上层建筑是一个谎言,其基础则是巨大的、令人不寒而栗的恐怖.
sentences.en: The superstructure is a lie and the foundation is a huge quaking fear.

sentences.cn: 我签署过一纸谎言, 申领过那个倒霉的钱袋.
sentences.en: I signed a lie, and claimed the miserable sack.

sentences.cn: 是的, 郊区的每一天都充满了许多新的谎言.
sentences.en: Yes, each day of suburbia brings it a new set of lies.

sentences.cn: 她企图用谎言掩饰自己的罪行.
sentences.en: She tried to cover up her guilt by lying.

sentences.cn: 她断言这一说法是谎言.
sentences.en: She that the allegation was a lie.

sentences.cn: 她的整个故事是一套谎言.
sentences.en: Her whole story was a tissue of lies.

sentences.cn: 那么, 究竟什么是谎言? 只不过是化了装的真理.
sentences.en: And, after all what is a lie? Tis but the truth in masquerade.

sentences.cn: 这就是人们时常提及的 “?M人 之谈 ” 或 “ 公众谎言 ”.
sentences.en: This is what has been frequently referred to as " doublespeak " or " public lying ".

sentences.cn: 你将, 你将会试尽你的谎言和一切方法去补救.
sentences.en: You'll exhaust your lies and remedies, you will.

sentences.cn: 这不能不使人感到考克斯等人编造谎言的能力实在太强了.
sentences.en: This cannot but show people how skilled Cox and others are at fabricating lies.

sentences.en: But you smear with lies; You are all worthless physicians.

sentences.cn: 这本书是一大堆谎言.
sentences.en: The book told a pack of lies.

sentences.cn: 他所说的是一派谎言.
sentences.en: What he said is a tissue of lies.

sentences.cn: 我是个女人, 你的谎言说得谦恭有礼, 这次就饶恕你了.
sentences.en: Being but a woman, I will forgive thee the lie, for it was courteously said.

sentences.cn: 厚颜无耻的谎话
sentences.en: a barefaced lie (= a lie that is deliberate and shocking)

sentences.cn: 保持镇定, 对说过的谎话忏悔一下,你会感到轻松的.
sentences.en: AN : Keep a level head, make a clean breast of the lie and you'll feel released.

sentences.cn: 他对我所说的全是谎话.
sentences.en: He told me nothing but pack of lies.

sentences.cn: 我把就要脱口而出的一句谎话忍住了.
sentences.en: I trapped a lie in my throat.

sentences.cn: 为了推动工作,他签署任何文件, 编造任何谎话.
sentences.en: To get things moving he signed any papers, told any lie.

sentences.cn: 我们不能像年轻人那样老是费脑子说谎话.
sentences.en: We can't be bothered to lie all the time like the young.

sentences.cn: 撒旦有两个名字, 他叫撒旦,又叫谎话.
sentences.en: Satan has two names, he is called Satan and Lying.

sentences.cn: 他不正直的天性表现在小谎话及细小的不诚实行为中.
sentences.en: His devious nature was shown in half lies and small dishonesties.

sentences.cn: 不要编造谎话来骗我们.
sentences.en: Don't make up a lie to deceive us.

sentences.cn: 我们高谈阔论, 真爱太少,谎话连篇.
sentences.en: We talk too much , love too little and lie too often.

sentences.cn: 你若对孩子撒谎,孩子就会说谎话.
sentences.en: A child who is lied to will lie.

sentences.cn: 她的话听起来像那麽回事, 但我认为那是谎话.
sentences.en: What she say sounded convincing, but I suspect it to is a lie.

sentences.cn: 你不该说如此明显的谎话.
sentences.en: You shouldn't tell such obvious lies.

sentences.cn: “ 这是谎话, 我告诉你, " 他用低沉严厉的口气说道.
sentences.en: " It's a lie, I tell you, " he said, in a low, sharp voice.

sentences.cn: 当着她那纯洁的脸,我说不出谎话.
sentences.en: I could not lie in her pure face.

sentences.cn: 心理学家说,人们说谎话的首要原因是要避免与别人发生冲突.
sentences.en: Psychologists say the number one reason why people lie is to avoid confrontation.

sentences.cn: 神经学家们则在探究在我们编造谎话时究竟是大脑的哪个区域被激活.
sentences.en: Neuroscientists are tracking which regions of the brain are activated when we spin lies.

sentences.cn: 没完没了地听这种谎话,真叫人心烦.
sentences.en: It riled me no end to listen to such lies.

sentences.cn: 谎话总是捏造出来的,难道你不知道 吗 ?
sentences.en: Don't you know a lie is always invented?

sentences.cn: 他所说的是十足的谎话.
sentences.en: What he said is a round lie.

sentences.cn: 击败你能发明的全部谎话.
sentences.en: Beats all the Lies you can invent.

sentences.cn: 通常情况下,我3天里头说的谎话要比别人3年里头说的还多.
sentences.en: Normally in three days I speak more lies than another speak in three years.

sentences.cn: 警方发现那男子所说的全是谎话.
sentences.en: The police find the man a complete pack of lies.

sentences.cn: 你应该为说这些谎话而感到羞耻.
sentences.en: You should be ashamed of yourself for telling such lies.

sentences.cn: 所有科学断言的地球年龄是谎话; 而进化不发生.
sentences.en: All scientific claims about the age of the Earth are lies; evolution does not occur.

sentences.cn: 哪组人更善于发现谎话, 是观者, 听者还是读者?
sentences.en: Which groups of people were at finding the lie, viewers, listeners or readers?

sentences.cn: 但是他们怎么能说这样一个谎话, 那样不会被捕 吗 ?
sentences.en: But how could they tell such a lie, and not get caught?

sentences.cn: 孩子和傻子,不会说谎话.
sentences.en: Children and fools cannot lie.

sentences.cn: 含糊其词是谎话的.
sentences.en: Equivocation is Number 1 cousin to a lie.

sentences.cn: 许多植物冬天呈休眠状态.

sentences.cn: 我大略知道沈船的位置.
sentences.en: I have a rough idea where the sinked ship lie on.

sentences.cn: 这里地处长江三角洲地区,机场、港口 、 河道 、 铁路、高速公路纵横密布,地理位置优越,环境优美宜人.
sentences.en: It lies in the Yangtes Delta where airports, harbs, rivers, railway express highway are convenient.

sentences.cn: 在到达确切位置的时候, 他看到地上有一条狼的尾巴.
sentences.en: Upon reaching the location, he found a piece of a wolf's tail lying upon the ground.

sentences.cn: 土星, 太阳系的第六大行星, 位于月亮的北方 ( 或更高 ) 的位置.
sentences.en: Saturn, the 6 th planet outward from the sun, lies to the north ( or above ) the moon.

sentences.cn: 这里的位置是最理想的,因为海岸边的水下就是大片的峡谷.
sentences.en: And they couldn't be more perfectly placed because just off shore lies a vast submarine canyon.

sentences.cn: 这个高尔夫球处于一个无法击出的位置.
sentences.en: The golf ball was in an unplayable lie.

sentences.cn: 这个边界就是全像理论中全像图所在的位置.
sentences.en: This boundary is where the hologram of the holographic theory lies.
